[[Center(begin)]]
= '''Hirlam-A System Release and Status'''  =
[[LastModified]]
[[Center(end)]]

We provide here information about the current, upcoming and past HIRLAM releases. Releases are available via [https://svn.hirlam.org/ Hirlam's Subversion repository] or source tarballs. Check ReleaseScenario for how we coordinate features with releases.

== Planned Releases ==
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.2], late 2007
 * [wiki:Harmonie_32h1], summer 2007, based on Cycle 32t2

== Done Releases ==
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1].2, 3 August 2007, second bug correction release for Hirlam-7.1, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1.2]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1].1, 30 May 2007, bug correction release for Hirlam-7.1, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1.1]
 * [wiki:Harmonie_31h1], 3 May 2007, official release of Harmonie 31h1, see [wiki:Harmonie_31h1]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1], 28 March 2007, official release of Hirlam-7.1, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1] rc 2, 14 March 2007, second release candidate for Hirlam-7.1, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1rc2]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1] rc 1, 19 February 2007, release candidate for Hirlam-7.1, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1rc1]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1] beta 3, 16 Feb 2007, third beta release for Hirlam-7.1, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1beta3]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1] beta 3, 16 Feb 2007, third beta release for Hirlam-7.1, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1beta3]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1] beta 2, 9 Jan 2007, Second beta release for Hirlam-7.1, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1beta2]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1] beta 1, 9 Jan 2007, First beta release for Hirlam-7.1, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1beta1]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1] alpha 3, 27 November 2006, third release for Hirlam-7.1, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1alpha3]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1] alpha 3-newsnow, 27 November 2006, integrated version of development branch 'newsnow' with the Hirlam-7.1 alpha3, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1alpha3newsnow]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.0].1, 8 November 2006, the update version of the official HIRLAM release Hirlam 7.0, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.0.1]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1] alpha 2, 8 November 2006, second trial release for Hirlam-7.1, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1alpha2]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1] alpha 2-newsnow, 8 November 2006, integrated version of development branch 'newsnow' with the Hirlam-7.1 alpha2, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1alpha2newsnow]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.1] alpha 1, 27 September 2006, first trial for HIRLAM-7.1, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1alpha1]
 * [wiki:Hirlam_7.0], 2 May 2006, first official HIRLAM release in HIRLAM-A, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.0]
 * Hirlam 7.0 rc1, April 18 2006, first release candidate for 7.0, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.0rc1]
 * Hirlam 7.0 beta1, March 9 2006, first beta release for 7.0 using Subversion, see [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.0beta1]
 * Hirlam 6.4.4, Feb 9 2006, last beta release intended for 7.0 with bug fix and features, see [https://hirlam.org/UG/ReleaseNotes/HL6_4_4.html ReleaseNotes6.4.4]

== Earlier releases in previous HIRLAM projects ==

Release notes for earlier versions under previous HIRLAM projects are available on the [https://hirlam.org HexNet] via links System Info -> Release Notes.
